item.title: Computer Graphics
item.description: Computer Graphics Back to modules Teaching team Jeremie Clos Vaughan Wang Kristian Spoerer Core ideas of the module Understanding 3D geometry and 3D transformations, how they relate to what appears on your screen, and how to go from intuition to mathematical formulation to implementation. Recommended reading Other reading

item.title: Databases, Interfaces and Software design
item.description: Databases, Interfaces (and Software design) Back to modules Teaching team Stuart Reeves Jeremie Clos Core ideas of the module Understanding the architecture of web applications from data storage to presentation to the users. In this module we focus on the structure of databases, including how to make them fast, efficient and reliable and on the ways of interacting with them via user interfaces. We examine the fundamentals of the relational database model, its mathematical basis, as well as implementations of the model in database management systems (DBMS) and languages to interact with them such as Structured Query Language (SQL).

item.title: Human-AI Interaction
item.description: Human-AI Interaction Back to modules Teaching team Joel Fischer Jeremie Clos Core ideas of the module Understanding the challenges of human-AI interaction from a sociological and technical perspective. This module is part of the Human-Computer Interaction theme, and the Artificial Intelligence and Optimisation theme in the School of Computer Science. It is an introduction to the design of human-AI interaction to ensure the AI-driven systems we built are beneficial and useful to people.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects 1. Read this first If you contact me and it is obvious from your e-mail that you did not read this page, I will ignore your request. Because 2020 was a dumpster fire of a year, and the world does not seem to be going in an upward direction, I am progressively shifting my focus to supervising projects for social good, i.e. projects which have a net positive or at least a net neutral ethical footprint.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Modules Year Term Module 2020-2021 Spring Databases and Interfaces ; Computer Graphics 2020-2021 Autumn Human-AI Interaction ; Databases, Interfaces and Software design 2019-2020 Spring Databases and Interfaces ; Computer Graphics 2019-2020 Autumn Databases, Interfaces and Software design 2018-2019 Spring Lab help in about a dozen modules Databases I teach multiple flavours of this module: databases and interfaces is the undergraduate module, while databases, interfaces and software design principles is the postgraduate version of the module.
